text: Kerry Marisa Washington (born January 31, 1977) is an American actress, producer and director. She is known for playing Olivia Pope on the drama TV series Scandal and Alicia Masters in the Tim Story's Fantastic Four movies (2005â€“2007). == Filmography == * Fantastic Four (2005) * Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer (2007) * Django Unchained (2012) * Cars 3 (2017) == Other websites == * Category:1977 births Category:African-American movie actors Category:African-American voice actors Category:African-American movie directors Category:African-American movie producers Category:American television directors Category:American television producers Category:Emmy Award winners Category:American LGBT rights activists Category:Actors from New York City Category:Living people
title: Kerry Washington
